comments:
Eclipse SDK 3.2.0 from Callisto.

CDT 3.1.1 installed from Callisto updates.

Bug is reproducible by another user - see attached URL which reported the same problem to the cdt newsgroup recently.  

1. Create a C/C++ HelloWorld project with a hello.c file implementing main().
2. Build the project - compiles OK.
3. In the Navigator tab, select the project, right click, select Run As/Run.
4. In the run configuration diaglogue, select C/C++ Local application, right click and select New.
5. An error dialogue appears stating "An error has occurred. See error log for more details"

Output in the workspace/.metadata/.log file is  as follows

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jface 4 2 2007-02-01 13:18:16.463
